sentences.en: ...people who were dependent for their water supply on this pestilential stream.
sentences.cn: ...那些靠这条致病的河流来取水的人们。

sentences.en: As Jefferson said, cities are pestilential to the morals , the health, and the liberties of man.
sentences.cn: 如杰斐逊所言, 城市“毒害了人类的精神 、 体和自由”.

sentences.en: Many people were dependent for their water supply on this pestilential stream.
sentences.cn: 许多人靠这条水质受污、可致疫病的河流来取水。

sentences.en: Pestilence is a fierce and infective disease which is caused by the pestilential pathogen.
sentences.cn: 疫病是由感受疫疠之气引起的一种具有强烈传染性的疾病.

words.tran_cn: 害虫；有害之物；讨厌的人
瘟疫（尤指鼠疫）；有害的事物
引起瘟疫的；瘟疫似的；讨厌的

trans.tran_cn: 瘟疫的， 传染病的，有害的， 危害社会的
